titleText: Microsoft Claims Another Cloud Win as Symantec Moves Onto Azure
mainText: Symantec, a security software specialist, is turning to Microsoft's public cloud in an effort to cut its own data center costs. The news was disclosed by Microsoft early Monday. Some workloads will remain on Symantec's own.

titleText: Microsoft shows off its Fluent Design changes to Windows 10
mainText: Microsoft first unveiled its Fluent Design language earlier this year, promising subtle changes to the company’s software in the future. The first part of Fluent Design will appear in the Windows 10 Fall Creators Update.

titleText: Windows Subsystem for Linux graduates in Windows 10 Fall Creators Update
mainText: Interested in running Linux on Windows 10 with Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL), but nervous about it being both a beta and only available in Windows 10 developer mode? Your worries are over. In the.
